mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM user WHERE eid = #{eid}) AS user_exists;
mapper.insert: insert into user (USER_ID, EID, PWD, NIC, USER_INTRO, USER_IMG_PATH, SIGNUP_DTM, HOLD_PNT, MSG_ALOW_YN) values (#{userId}, #{eid}, #{pwd}, #{nic}, #{userIntro}, #{userImgPath}, now(), #{holdPnt}, #{msgAlowYn})
